description:
Rubber like elasticity combined with durability and strength make these patches great for dry bags, inflatable boats or SUPS and for steel, fabric or plastic items.

  • Permanent, heavy-duty repairs to cover rips, tears and holes
  • Tough TPU fabric is flexible and resists punctures, abrasions, tears and weathering
  • Stays flexible in cold temperatures
  • Clear and transparent for nearly invisible repairs
  • Withstands washing
  • Will not yellow from UV exposure
  • Includes 2, 7.6 x 12.7cm rectangular repair patches
name: Gear Aid Tenacious Tape Flex Patches
